import React from "react"; import "./ProductListItem.css"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductListItem = ({ imgNo, productName, productPriceFormatted, productInfo, productReview, productGrade }) => { return (
  • {productName}
  • {productPriceFormatted}원 24%
  • {productInfo}
  • 리뷰 {productReview} 평점 * {productGrade}/5
) }; //ProductList export default ProductListItem;
